CustomField.description:
Returns the current ROE Territory assigned to the Lead based on Subregion__c. Used to ensure that leads created from Chili Piper are routed correctly.
External Systems Utillization: Chili Piper
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns the current ROE Territory assigned to the Lead based on Subregion__c. Used to ensure that leads created from Chili Piper are routed correctly.
CustomField.label: ROE Territory
